pluginstrument.author: Joe "Crunchmeister" Gilker
pluginstrument.description:
Modification of the Sim Innovations G1000 bezel by Russ Barlow. - Improved graphics - VNAV with Working Title G1000 NXi functions - Added detection of VS and FLC states for improved behaviour of Nose Up / Down keys
02-09-2021 - Added fix for FLC not working with Working TItle G1000 NXi 0.5.0
